name: Sites Rows
description: This type is used to represent individual pages. Page specific meta data is controlled via the "descriptor" element. Page content can be placed into the container elements of this page.

elements.helpText: This element controls the list of sections to be rendered on this page.
elements.label: Rows

elements.helpText: This element controls the editor UI that is used to edit this page.
elements.label: Editor

elements.helpText: This element controls width in pixels for this page.
elements.label: Width

elements.helpText: This element controls the padding values for this page.
elements.label: Padding

elements.helpText: This element controls the margin values for this page.
elements.label: Margin

elements.helpText: This element controls the background for this page.
elements.label: Background Color

elements.helpText: This element provides the page meta data for this page and the link to the site hosting this page.
elements.label: descriptor

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
